ownerships.owner: The Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president/director of TIHH Member Corp., of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.

ownerships.owner: The Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust

familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of TIHH Member LLC, of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
